sample.title: Blockchain Address Generator
sample.summary: Usage of the Blockchain Address Generator Component

replacement.value: This template generates an address that can used in the "Blockchain Demo" template.\line\line Addresses in this demo template are defined by name. The "RSA Key Generator" component creates a public e,N and a private key d,N. The format used by the blockchain demo template is: address,N,e,d. To use it in the other template, copy the output shown in the "Final address" component and paste it into the "Address input" component of the "Blockchain Demo" template.\line\line For demo purposes we decided to use only small RSA parameters (Range = 100 in the RSA Key Generator's settings).
